summary: A standalone re-texture of NoseGoblin\'s Assassins, Rangers and Thieves Armor.
descriptionHtml:
Regal Assassins Armor
Author - DreamBurrow
Orignal Mesh - NoseGoblin

(I will be rarely on as much so questions will not me answered right away. My companions will never be up for download, questions about them will not be answered anymore. Learn to make you\'re own unique characters, I find that\'s better then receiving one. Please don\'t demand anything from me, I\'m not obligated to do anything for anyone. I do this because I enjoy it and I share it because I love the community. Thank you.)
--------------------------
Description: (For the love of all that is good, please read it!!)

X\'D Hello Hello!! 

You do not need to install his armor. This works on it\'s own and does not replace anything. 

The inspiration for this armor came from the amazing npc outfits from Assassins Creed Revelations xD. I loved the clothing style so much that I wanted to make a similar look for my follower. 

Can be crafted at the forge under leather. Is light armor. Clothing version can be crafted at the tanning rack under leather. 

Now for Men and Women. Comes with a scarf, hood, two different types of armor, and 6 different colors. Works for Khajiits and Argonians. But might be some slight clipping with the Hood. 

And for the females a hoods with hairs version of the Regal Assassin Hood have been added. Comes in many color variations that can be crafted at the forge under leather. 

This is a standalone re-texture of NoseGoblins Assassins, Rangers and Thieves Armor.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4632/

And uses a scarf mesh from Grimoa\'s awesome Scarf and Gugel Mod::
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17401

And uses Grace Darklings Ranger Armor as a base for the female regal armor.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7184

And thanks to Gambit77, Hoods with hair by zzjay and Grace Darkling have been added.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28147/

Also, I recommend this blindfold mod::
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13551

As always, Thank you for downloading, and I hope you enjoy!
And if you like the armor, be sure to come back and show me some love lol. 

[youtube]9o1kCe3UYaA[/youtube]

[youtube]lM0DpQB2Qrk[/youtube]
--------------------------
Installation: 

Use the Nexus Mod Manager to install or

Copy all content to the Skyrim/Data folder.

--------------------------
Uninstallation: 

Remove the following folders:

Data\\textures\\DreamBurrow\\RegalAssassin
Data\\meshes\\DreamBurrow\\RegalAssassin

Or uninstall using NMM. 


---------------------------

Known Issues:

Poor quality, I\'m still learning a lot about texturing.

The cape has transparency applied to it, so it may have some issues like lighting, etc. 
Slight clipping on the hoods for Khajiits and Argonians. 

If you find any more issues, please let me know! 
---------------------------
Permissions:
DO NOT upload any of my works with out my expressed permission. Thank you. 
I do not give permissions to upload my works on Steam, whatsoever. 
---------------------------

Credits:

Bethesda - Skyrim

NoseGoblin - For being awesome and letting people freely mod his work.

MartinPurvis - His standalone file helped me figure out how to make one. 

Grimoa - For giving me permission to use her scarf mesh for this mod. 

SydneyB- For her help with fixing lighting issues with transparent meshes.

Lederberg - For helping me find the solution to fixing the weird undercape. 

Grace Darkling - For giving me permission to use her amazing armor as a base for the female version. 

zzjay - For permission to use her awesome mod, Hoods with hairs! 

Gambit - For making a hoods and hair version for the Regal Assassin Hood. 

You - Though I say I create these things for myself, I actually just really love creating for the
community!
author: DreamBurrow

files.name: DreamBurrows Regal Assassin Armor
files.changelogHtml:
The Black Version of the armor was more brown, changed it to look much darker.
Female Version of Regal Assassin Armor.
First person armor textures weren\'t show, edited the mesh in Nifskope and applied texture. Female textures show now.

files.name: DreamBurrows Regal Assassin Armor
files.changelogHtml:
Added new colors Purple and Brown.
Added clothing version for all armors, can be crafted in the tanning rack under leather.
Fixed the male regal variant, was black, now is back to the normal default color.

files.name: zzjay and Grace Darklings Hoods With Hairs - Dreamburrows Regal Assassin
